markdownRemark.html: A local market that sells anything from fish to appliances. This market is a little gem, but hidden away on all four entry sides between tall buildings. The market also has a bar situated in the middle.

frontmatter.title: Plaza De Abastos Los Remedios
frontmatter.description: Plaza De Abastos Los Remedios - A local market that sells anything from fish to appliances. This market is a little gem, but hidden away on all four entry sides between tall buildings. The market also has a bar situated in the middle.
frontmatter.address: Calle Virgen de la Victoria, 41011 Sevilla
